field.name: description
field.value:
Added an "Introduction to MonoRail" section and made various corrections (spelling/grammatical) to the Reference Manual and User's Guide sections.
Patch created from /site/xdocs directory.

comment.author: psteele

comment.text: * '''Resolution''' set to ''Applied''. * '''Version Fixed''' set to ''Future''. * '''Status''' changed from ''Open'' to ''Resolved''.
